title: Новая фабрика звёзд
overview: TNT TV channel is reviving a musical show that became iconic in the 2000s and gave Russian show business more than a dozen stars. The large-scale project will be aired again in an updated format called The New Star Factory. The project is being produced by White Media, which is already producing the TNT shows "Candy" and "Brighter than the Stars".The whole country knows the participants of the project today. Polina Gagarina, Timati, Yulia Savicheva, Vlad Sokolovsky, Natalia Podolskaya, Miguel, Julianna Karaulova, Irina Dubtsova are an incomplete list of those who started their careers in the show. It's time to light up new stars and discover new talents – TNT will do this.
